detectors.description: Variable Ownable._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XRPProofofStakeChain.sol#55) is not in mixedCase

owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XRPProofofStakeChain.sol#64-66)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XRPProofofStakeChain.sol#73-76)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XRPProofofStakeChain.sol#78-82)

totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- XRPProofofStakeChain.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XRPProofofStakeChain.sol#150-156)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- XRPProofofStakeChain.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XRPProofofStakeChain.sol#158-164)
